climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: 【TOUGHNESS FROM THE INSIDE OUT】The Amazfit T-Rex Pro comes with a 1.3" HD AMOLED always-on color screen; The outer bezel undergoes a metal-spraying process, which enhances the rich textures of the light 60g watch body. Having passed 15 military-grade tests1, this smart watch can battle with you through hot deserts, humid rainforest and polar glaciers. Witness endurance that braves the elements with ease..Supported Application:Alarm,Calendar,Calorie Tracker,Heart Rate Monitor,Distance Tracking. Connectivity technology:GPS. Wireless comm standard:Bluetooth

【YOUR PARTNER IN EXPLORATION】The Amazfit T-Rex Pro smartwatch is high-level exploration partner, supporting four global navigation satellite systems, a blood-oxygen saturation measurement system, a heart rate monitor, a sleep monitor, a weather tracker, a sunrise and sunset monitor, a current moon phase display, a compass and barometric altimeter.

【Ultra-long 18 Day Battery Life】When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 18 days of activity and progress with typical usage, or up to 9 days with heavy usage, or up to 40 hours with GPS continuous working mode. Go nonstop with T-Rex Pro watch！

【10 ATM WATER RESISTANT】With a 10 ATM grade, the Amazfit T-Rex Pro smartwatch is water-resistant to a depth of up to 100 meters and can accompany you as you surf, swim, or explore the mysterious underwater world together.

【OVER 100 SPORTS MODES】The Amazfit T-Rex Pro fitness watch features over 100 sports modes and can be used to monitor critical data such as workout heart rate, distance traveled, movement speed, and calories burned in real time for most sports modes, to help you track and improve your athletic performance.

【YOUR ULTIMATE PERSONAL ASSISTANT】The Amazfit T-Rex Pro smart watch notifies you of any incoming text messages or calls, scheduled alarms, and events, to prevent you from missing any important information. It can also easily control music playback.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rough and Ready Design The Amazfit T-Rex Pro smart watch is a titanic combination of practicality, strength, and comfort. The clarity of the 1.3-inch HD AMOLED color screen, with its always-on display, ensures that you don’t have to halt your activity to check important information. The outer bezel undergoes a metal-spraying process, which enhances the rich textures of the light 60g watch body. The Amazfit T-Rex Pro smartwatch is accompanied by a skin-friendly silicone strap with a sweat-wicking design to ensure it stays dry and comfortable. 15 Military Standard Certified The shape of the Amazfit T-Rex Pro is tough and solid with distinct angles. Having passed 15 military-grade tests, the smartwatch can battle with you through hot deserts, humid rainforests, and polar glaciers. Witness endurance that braves the elements with ease. Heart Rate Monitoring The Amazfit T-Rex Pro fitness watch offers 24-hour heart rate monitoring and is able to provide instant alerts for all cases of high heart rate. Heart health is a top priority, and so your Amazfit T-Rex Pro smartwatch tracks it at all times, and can also record your heart rate variability (HRV) throughout the day, to monitor your body pressure. Learning to relax is the first step in protecting your health.

Blood-oxygen Saturation Measurement In high-altitude areas, the Amazfit T-Rex Pro smart watch will alert you whenever it detects that you experience major altitude changes, and prompt you to take the blood-oxygen saturation measurement test to help you ascend safely. This test can also be taken whenever you feel uncomfortable, in order to better protect your body. Sleep Quality Monitoring Sleep quality is essential to health, and so the Amazfit T-Rex Pro smart watch serves as your personal sleep assistant. The smartwatch can recognize different sleep states - such as the light, deep, and REM sleep stages, as well as daytime naps, and monitors any potential breathing problems during your sleep. Get Personalized Evaluations with PAI PAI is a health assessment system that uses an algorithm to transform complex information such as heart rate, activity duration, and other health data into a single numerical value unique to each user. The PAI health assessment system supports most workout modes, regardless of time or location, and in addition, also creates a customized health evaluation for each user to offer a personalized user experience.

Over 100 Sports Modes The Amazfit T-Rex Pro sports watch features over 100 sports modes, and can be used to monitor critical data such as workout heart rate, distance traveled, movement speed, and calories burned in real-time for most sports modes, to help you track and improve your athletic performance. 10 ATM Water Resistant With a 10 ATM grade, the Amazfit T-Rex Pro sports watch is water-resistant to a depth of up to 100 meters, the Amazfit T-Rex Pro smartwatch can accompany you as you surf, swim, or explore the mysterious underwater world together. Strong 18-Day Battery Life When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 18 days of activity and progress with typical usage, or up to 9 days with heavy usage, or GPS continuous working time: up to 40 hours. One Charge for 18-day Amazfit T Rex Pro smartwatch's accompany.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice Screen, good battery life, responsive touch.Watch is neat and easy to use,Be sure to save battery by not using always on or motion display.Also protect your watch screen with a the tempered glass screen protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just right for me
reviews.reviewText: I was not really sure I needed a smart watch, so this purchase was a test run to understand the workings and benefits a smartwatch offers.The model I am reviewing is not the latest offering and it is a refurbished item. However, it is a really good match for what I figured my discovery needs would be. It hit every mark and then some.Here are my high points in sort of bullet point form: The watch mates with an app on my cell phone. The app is easy to download, has tons of data and fairly simple to use. The short side is that it is a bit slow on my phone, an older Samsung. (My phone is off most of the day. So, this may contribute to slow.) There are a lot of features, but I just use a few regularly; workout-walking, sleep measurements, heart rate and good old time/date. Walking is what I do for exercise. The watch tracks and stores a lot of walking workout data. Some unexpected things like elevation change, heart rate chart, step count and length along with a measured GPS track. Very cool. That data is stored in the Zepp app on my phone and up-dates seamlessly when the Zepp app is active. Custom faces are available for free and up to 2 bucks inside the app. A tad addictive here since there are a lot of choices. I think I downloaded at least six and have one that seems to be my daily user. More of the cool factor here.Some closing comments since there is really too many features to detail in full. I have just covered the things I use and find helpful. My pre-purchase regimen is to look at several on-line video reviews and there was plenty of material out there for a good decision. Briefly on measurements, I have no way to test the accuracy of the data. But it does seem to be reasonably, intuitively, accurate. Finally, my experience with a renewed item: It shipped quickly and came in the original box in like new condition.This watch did inspire me to do more on my workout. The data produced showed me that I was not doing enough work even though I thought I was. Just a little more effort and the stats looked way better.In closing, it is above my expectations in build quality, features, app interface and overall utility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly useful, some drawbacks
reviews.reviewText: Purchased a couple months ago and overall I love it. The workout settings are great and help motivate me to get out and get working. Blutooth control works perfectly for music, the GPS for outdoor runs is very accurate. I can keep my phone on silent and the watch alerts me for calls and texts. Battery life is excellent, and it's built tough.On the not so good list,The sensors for sleep must be programmed off of the heart sensor, which kinda sucks. It skips whole hours of the day and night and sends alerts to get a sleep study.The alerts for movement and steps are very annoying and don't take into account what time of day it is. Every night without fail it tells me to get up and get moving when I'm about to fall asleep in bed. I'm sure there is a way to disable it but I haven't found it yet for the final reason I dislike.The menu system is totally non intuitive. Typical for Chinese products, it is rather hard to navigate and find what you need.Overall it's pretty good, and I'm happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for the buck I have found.
reviews.reviewText: I've tried multiple models of Fitbit and they generally last a year for me. 2 or 3 if you are very careful. I am not. I whitewater kayak, hike, backpack, hunt, fish, trail run and work on all kinds of things. I don't take off my watch, because what good is a watch if it isn't on your body. This is very durable, it has gone down many class 3 - 4+ rivers and has a couple of minor scratches on the face, but that is without a screen protector, which is my fault. I love the number of features you get with this watch. It has amazing battery life. I was a little concerned about the origin of the watch, but I am very pleased with it. I have friends that use Garmin, Apple, Google, Fitbit, etc. and all are impressed with the number of features in this watch. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for watch that will withstand the abuse of physical activities. I liked it so much, I bought one for my father, who also loves the watch. I do think I will buy a screen protector for it though. Good luck and live life to it's fullest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great battery life.
reviews.reviewText: I use primarily to track sleep pattern and for snowboarding. I like the battery lasts a looong time. It does a good job, but I havent tried any other to compare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but it has flaws
reviews.reviewText: I like this watch. I find it useful. What bothers me is that when I'm working out the heart rate monitor is often very incorrect. My actual heart rate will be around 130 and my watch says it's 80.. pretty frustrating..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great so far
reviews.reviewText: Great watch, so far is working perfect, great screen and battery not very well
Cuando lo pedí dude de un producto reconstruido pero estoy maravillado del reloj luce como si fuera nuevo y la pila dura bastante lo cargue hace quince días y está en el 54% estoy feliz con mi compra

reviews.reviewerName: Javier Esteban Márquez EscobedoJavier Esteban Márquez Escobedo
reviews.reviewText: Llegó en muy buen estado además que la batería llevo más 15 días sin cargar.

El reloj es bastante preciso en la detección de actividad, medición de frecuencia cardiaca, oxígeno, barómetro/altitud.La brújula sí requiere calibrarse con frecuencia, pero es muy fácil y rápido (sólo girar la muñeca unas pocas veces). La distancia la mide con muy buena precisión, igual que la posición. El reloj me indica la ruta a seguir (una vez descargada), me avisa si me alejo de la ruta pregrabada (lo cual ya hice y me ayudó a regresar). En modo de seguimiento de ruta, la batería bajó al 55% después de 10 horas de uso, lo cual ningún reloj de otra marca puede ofrecer.
No puedo dar una opinion ya que fue para un regalo.

The media could not be loaded. Al ser un producto renewed por el precio no esperaba que el mismo fuera a compararse con uno nuevo, lo cual me ha sorprendido gratamente, llegó en su empaque original y accesorio de carga original, fue algo rápido vincularlo al teléfono y un poco más de prestar atención a las funciones propias del reloj, por el momento no he tenido complicaciones más allá de que a veces se desvincula cuando me alejo lo suficiente del celular y no se vuelve a reconectar en automático, será cuestión del reloj quizás ya que eso no me pasaba con mi anterior pulsera. En general es una excelente compra.
